title: Teaching with AI
summary: Educators are using ChatGPT in various ways to enhance student learning. Dr. Helen Crompton encourages role-playing challenging conversations, while Fran Bellas suggests using ChatGPT to create quizzes, tests, and lesson plans. Dr. Anthony Kaziboni uses ChatGPT to assist non-English speakers with translation and English writing. Geetha Venugopal teaches students about critical thinking and advises them to verify information from ChatGPT through other sources. Example prompts are provided for educators to use with ChatGPT, including creating lesson plans, developing explanations and examples, facilitating student learning, and creating an AI tutor.
